document_data.name: Dalanir Ch'fyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Dalanir Ch'fyr''' was a [[drow]] [[diviner]] and information broker who operated in [[Luskan]] under the pseudonym '''Soronil Noonshadow'''.
document_data.History: His past life was a mystery, and his ability to survive in Luskan despite the enemies his profession made him was also a mystery. Fortunately, Dalanir liked mysteries, and he was a fountain of information for anyone who could pay or work for it.
